text: Aynaghar () is a colloquial term referring to a network of clandestine detention centers which were operated by the Directorate General of Forces Intelligence (DGFI), the intelligence branch of Bangladesh's defence forces and Rapid Action Battalion (RAB), an elite force unit of Bangladesh Police, during the authoritarian rule of former prime minister Sheikh Hasina. ==References== Category:Enforced disappearances in Bangladesh Category:Black sites Category:Counterterrorism in Bangladesh Category:Human rights abuses in Bangladesh
title: Aynaghar
